name: Loans to members
text: §412:10-402  Loans to members.  A credit union may make unsecured and secured loans to its members for such purposes and upon such conditions as the bylaws may provide.  The board of directors shall establish written policies with respect to the granting of loans and the extending of lines of credit, including the terms, conditions and acceptable forms of security. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
